name: BonBon and the Adventure of the Cursed Flashlight
name_original: BonBon and the Adventure of the Cursed Flashlight
description:
The theme of this game is DUALITY (Created for the 2022 Global Game Jam)

Controls: 

Use your mouse to grab the blocks and push BonBon to victory!

Shine the Cursed Flashlight on BonBon to move him right! Lock the flashlight in place with M or Middle Mouse Click.

Press S to save your place.

Press R to restart from your save space.

1 binds the Carrot block, 2 binds the Celery.

Press the Number(#) keys to teleport your binded blocks to you.

So if you made it this far down you either 

1. Rage quit 

2. Needed some inspirational quotes

So we decided to go over the world to get you the help.

Here are your quotes/comments from real people:

I was in enough to get along with people. I was never socially inarticulate. Not a loner. And that saved my life, saved my sanity. That and the writing. But to this day I distrust anybody who thought this game was a good a idea.  ~Stephen King I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity. This game is one of those intervals.  ~Edgar Allan Poe Great kid, don't get cocky!  ~Han Solo When you are talking about, 'I will lose my sanity for real,' that's when it's time to move on but you can't because there's no return to main menu screen. ~Travis Kalanick I had a quick grasp of the secret to sanity, it had become the ability to hold the maximum of impossible combinations in one's mind but Bonbon kept going left so that secret is long gone!  ~ Norman Mailer What are you still doing reading this go play the game ~ James G, Ken V, Sean P
